stage-1.subtitle: Choose an option to get started
stage-1.modal-desc: If you're restoring a wallet created in another application, you may find some of your assets are not visible. Don't worry. Create a new wallet and send your assets to your new Lace wallet address and everything should be visible again.

stage-2.desc: Please review the lace Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
stage-2.title: Lace terms of use
stage-2.accept-the-terms: I accept the terms of use
stage-2.full-privacy:
Your privacy it's important to us

✅ Lace will collect pseudonymous analytics info
❌ Not access your private keys
❌ Not record your IP address
❌ Not sell your personal data
stage-2.full-terms:
Welcome to IOG's Services! Please read the following Terms of Service carefully before using our platform.

1. Use of Services:
1.1. You must be at least 18 years old to access and use our Services.
1.2. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and must not share your credentials with any third party.
1.3. Unauthorized use of Services terminates your license.

2. Third-Party Services:
2.1. Some Services may include Third-Party applications hosted by others.
2.2. IOG is not directly involved with Third-Party Services.
2.3. Use of Third-Party Services is subject to their respective terms and conditions.

3. Your Content:
3.1. You can post materials on our platform, referred to as 'Your Content.'
3.2. IOG has a license to use Your Content for its Business Purposes.

4. User Conduct:
4.1. Do not engage in any actions that violate the Terms or applicable law.
4.2. IOG may investigate possible violations and take necessary actions.

5. Limitation of Liability:
5.1. IOG is not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.
5.2. IOG's total liability for damages is limited to $100.

6. Dispute Resolution:
6.1. Attempt informal resolution before any arbitration.
6.2. All disputes will be resolved through arbitration, except for specified claims.
6.3. You have a 30-day right to opt out of the Arbitration Agreement.

7. General Provisions:
7.1. Communications between you and IOG will be in electronic form.
7.2. These Terms are governed by the laws of the state of New York.
7.3. All claims and disputes will be litigated exclusively in Manhattan, New York.

Thank you for using IOG's Services! If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us.

stage-3.title: Let’s setup your new wallet
stage-3.choose-a-wallet-name: Choose a name to help you identify your wallet
stage-3.password-validation-2: Use a longer pattern with more turns

stage-4.desc: We recommend to write it down in a safe place
stage-4.title: Save your passphrase

stage-5.desc: Enter each word of your recovery phrase in the right order
stage-5.title: Confirm your passphrase

stage-6.desc: It’s time to your start your Web3 journey. Plus you can follow us to stay up to date on all our latest news and content
stage-6.title: Hurray! All done :)
